column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I did not like their menma (bamboo shoots). So far
column2: all of the ramen restaurants I've tried
column5: thinly cut bamboo shoots. This place literally had sliced thick slices of menma and had no additional flavor to it. It was very hard to eat and they gave me a pretty generous ration but I only eat half a slice. They were also generous with the side of corn but you cant really go wrong with corn lol.
